document.masterDocTitle: A revised checklist of Odonata (Insecta) from Marambaia, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil with eight new records

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A revised checklist of Odonata (Insecta) from Marambaia, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil with eight new records

subSubSection.paragraph: A single male was collected in Marambaia Island, approximately 150 m of altitude in a clean, Atlantic Forest stream.

tr.th: TABLE 1. List of the Odonata adult species
